web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 1.1.4322back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008available databases [11]:[*] gmis[*] gmis2013108[*] Gzsdata2013[*] Gzsdata_hnu[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] pubs[*] ReportServer$SQL2008[*] ReportServer$SQL2008TempDB[*] tempdb
